item.title: A Novel Approach to Particle Physics
item.description: arXiv:2602.12345v1 27 Feb 2026. We present a novel method for computing cross-sections using machine learning techniques applied to high-energy physics processes.
item.dc:creator: Alice Smith, Bob Jones, Charlie Brown

item.title: Transformers for Jet Classification
item.description: arXiv:2602.67890v1 27 Feb 2026. We introduce a transformer-based architecture for classifying hadronic jets at the LHC with improved accuracy over existing methods.
item.dc:creator: Diana Prince, Eve Wilson
